text: The 1933 Volta a Catalunya was the 15th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 10 June to 18 June 1933. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Alfredo Bovet. == Route and stages == {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Course ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- !
